sources.title: Old San Francisco (1927) DVD MKV
sources.description: DVD remux of the 1927 Warner Bros. film "Old San Francisco." IMDb TMDB Wikipedia Old San Francisco is a 1927 American synchronized sound historical drama film starring Dolores Costello and featuring Warner Oland. While the film has no audible dialog, it was released with a synchronized musical score with sound effects using the Vitaphone sound-on-disc process. The film, which was produced and distributed by Warner Bros., was directed by Alan Crosland.

PizzaFLIX Presents CLASSIC MOVIE MONDAY
Stars: Dolores Costello, Warner Oland, Anna May Wong
Directed by: Alan Crosland
üçïPresented with the original synchronized orchestral score and sound effectsüçï
Set in 1906, a cruel and greedy czar of San Francisco's Tenderloin District seeks to possess the land of an old wealthy Spanish family.

Are you a PizzaFLIX Fanatic? Join our exclusive Fan Club for dedicated Classic movie lovers: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCE34fwgW7kWr7tc7YiOWtRw/join

metadata.Plot: The Vasquez family are one of the oldest families in San Francisco, but their day of glory is past and now all that remains of them are an old man and his granddaughter, the innocent Dolores. The villainous Chris Buckwell wants to steal their land and ranch from them, even using unfair means to get his hands on it. One of his employees' has a nephew who falls for Dolores, however, and together they make plans to save the ranch. Unfortunately for them, Buckwell has a secret and discovering it might prove dangerous.
metadata.Writer: Darryl F. Zanuck, Anthony Coldeway, Jack Jarmuth
metadata.Actors: Dolores Costello, Josef Swickard, Anders Randolf
